parameters.name: CheckId
parameters.description:
Check item ID.
> Obtain this parameter by calling the [ListCheckResult](~~ListCheckResult~~) interface.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) of the end time of the queried task.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Language type for request and response messages, default value is zh. Values:
- **zh**: Chinese
- **en**: English

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) of the start time of the queried task.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
Task type corresponding to the task:
- **REPAIR**: Repair task
- **ROLLBACK**: Rollback task
